publications.title: Scaling High-Throughput Experimentation Unlocks Robust Reaction-Outcome Prediction
publications.abstract: This paper introduces the largest library of reaction outcomes to date, and a model capable to predict the outcome of a reaction based on the reactants.

publications.title: Enhancing Image Quality in Dental-Maxillofacial CBCT: The Impact of Iterative Reconstruction and AI on Noise Reductionâ€”A Systematic Review
publications.abstract: This review compares various AI-based methods tackling the problem of noise reduction on CBCT images.
